sanskrit_verse:
नित्यमुद्यतदण्डः स्यान्नित्यं विवृतपौरुषः ।
नित्यं संवृतसंवार्यो नित्यं छिद्रानुसार्यरेः ॥ ७.१०२॥
transliteration: nityamudyatadaṇḍaḥ syānnityaṃ vivṛtapauruṣaḥ | nityaṃ saṃvṛtasaṃvāryo nityaṃ chidrānusāryareḥ || 7.102||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who is ever-ready in enforcement, ever-open in valor, ever-restrained in concealment, and ever-pursuing through gaps—such a ruler executes Dharma without deviation.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority as continuous readiness for enforcement
Restoration logic via persistent alignment with Dharma
Consciousness alignment through unwavering pursuit of truth
executable_legal_axioms: IF ruler capacity = fully engaged AND action integrity = transparent THEN enforcement readiness = perpetual
IF valor expression = open AND concealment tendency = restrained THEN governance clarity = maximum
IF gap detection = active AND pursuit consistency = uninterrupted THEN dharma execution = flawless
supreme_court_application: At the Supreme Court level, this verse establishes that judicial authority must remain perpetually vigilant, transparent in intent, restrained from hidden agendas, and relentlessly responsive to systemic gaps. Responsibility is measured by the unbroken alignment of consciousness with Dharma rather than procedural adherence alone.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality confirms that effective rulership arises from sustained inner readiness, not external coercion. Anupūrvaśaḥ manifests as sequential clarity in decision-making. Proportional responsibility lies in maintaining constant alignment with Dharma. The non-punitive reality rule affirms that true justice emerges when consciousness governs action.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Continuous recalibration of intent to ensure no divergence from Dharma
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Transparent declaration of all actions and decisions
Capacity Restoration Mechanism: Regular purification of perception to sustain vigilance
Integrity Reintegration Sequence: Ongoing reconciliation of policy with cosmic order
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone is the Supreme Adjudicator.
